Class AdminController

java.lang.Object

      @RequestMapping("") public String adminIndex(Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Administration zone index. Note that we can access current logged user just by adding the Principal parameter
      Parameters:
      principal - session
      model - to add data to response
      Returns:
      view admin/index
